attributes.action: ensure that mp's who have used ther position for financial gain are prosecuted, just like benefit fraudsters are, no let off for the richest influential people in society. start with alastair darling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are the people who have committed fraud being investigated in different ways? benefit fraudsters are chased through the courts and jailed, mp's are allowed to pay back their claims, no questions asked. Its about time these questions are asked and these so called leaders of our society are investigated, and prosecuted, like the ordinary people are

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
